titleStmt.title: The Saint turn'd curtezan, or, A new plot discover'd by a precious zealot of an assault and battery design'd upon the body of a sanctify'd sister &c. ... to the tune of the Quakers ballad.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the use of the Protestant-cobler in Pell-Mell,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
